testcase.name: Successful completion of purchase order
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Successful completion of purchase order Given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 5.025s Then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.058s When User adds item 'backpack' to the cart ... passed in 1.197s And User adds item 'fleece jacket' to the cart ... passed in 1.185s And User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.198s And User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.229s And User fills checkout details with first name:'John', last name:'Doe', and postal code:'12345' ... passed in 3.189s Then User continue from checkout overview ... passed in 1.216s When User verifies total amount as well as finishes the order ... passed in 1.224s Then User should see the order confirmation page with message Thank you for your order! ... passed in 0.007s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
